dct_title_s: Stanford's map of the seat of war in Afghanistan
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading, hachures, and spot heights.; Shows colored boundaries and landforms in Afghanistan at the time of the Second Anglo-Afghan War.; Published September 1, 1880.; Includes inset: The country around Kandahar.; Publisher's list of Ordnance Survey maps on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: Published by Edward Stanford,  55,  Charing Cross (London)
